contents.body: Kannukullae unnai vaithen.. kannammaNaan kangal mooda maatten adi sellama..Naan kangal mooda maattaen adi sellama.. Adi neethaan yen santhosham Poovellaam unn vaasam Nee pesum pechellaam Naan ketkum sangeetham Unn punnagai naan semikindra selvamadiNee illai endraal naanum ingae ezhaiyadi
En kannukula oru siriki iboibsc kjnkjnlkninkjbk m kjnioocpijp ihoihoiUH  hiiifhghighg
